products.Title: Apple Music
products.Description: Discover new releases, get daily personalized mixes, and sing along with real‑time lyrics. Listen in Spatial Audio with Dolby Atmos on your favorite devices.

products.Title: Apple Arcade
products.Description: One subscription. No ads or in‑app purchases. Share with your family and play across iPhone, iPad, Mac, and Apple TV.

products.Title: Apple Fitness+
products.Description: Work out or meditate with world‑class trainers. Track your progress with Apple Watch or iPhone and enjoy new sessions added regularly.
